DesignsSquare.com Gallery Widget Documentation

Another Widget For Drupal

  • Last Updated: Jan 12, 2015
  • Developed By: DesignsSquare.com
  • Email: contact@designssquare.com
.

Thank you for purchasing our product. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us. We like to hear from you.

About

DesignsSquare.com Gallery Widget contains:

  • Gallery Index: space for displaying all galleries
  • Gallery Display: display of a single gallery.
  • Gallery Teaser: displays multiple galleries via image thumbs in form of slider typically for the home page but can be assigned to any region in content area. Teaser is managed via views UI
  • Gallery Block: displays multiple galleries via image thumbs typically for regions such as sidebar, footer,etc. Block is configurable with views, context and blocks UI
  • Sample data such as sample galleries, index, block, teaser,etc for kickstart
  • Gallery items that can be images, videos, youtube and vimeo
  • At least two different layouts for Gallery block and Gallery index to choose from

Gallery

Gallery Index is space displaying multiple galleries. You can think of it as the entry point to the gallery widget. There is a sample gallery index at url address - '/ds-gallery'. This gallery space finds the last node instance of 'Gallery Index' and displays it. If you don't have gallery Index, you can create one by going 'admin/content/add" and select "DS Gallery Index"' or import data by enabling module "DesignsSquae.com: Gallery - Sample Data"

There is content type - "DS Gallery Index" that you would use if you would like to create a new gallery index. By default it is configured to have context - "gallery_index"

After creating gallery index, you need to tell what galleries to include in your gallery index. To do so, go to the Context UI(admin/structure/context) and edit context 'gallery_index'. Here, you assign the view containing the galleries you like to be included to the region 'Content'. There is sample view "DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: All" available for you to use and alter as you like. If you like to create your own view, then

  • it has to have a tag 'designssquare_gallery_index'
  • it has to reference a rendered instance of type 'DS Gallery'

Gallery Display

Gallery Display displays single gallery. Currently there is one layout that displays each gallery item with pop out effect. The items are organized by Gallery Item Tags

Gallery Teaser

Gallery Teaser is a block that can be assigned to any region via Block/Context UI. This block is a slider with gallery thumbs intended for landing / home page. he view - DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Teaser is used for configuring title, galleries to include in the teaser

Gallery Block

Gallery Block is a block that can be assigned to any region via Block/Contect UI. It is intended for regions such as sidebar, footer, etc. The view - DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Block is used to configure title as well the galleries to include

Installation

Here are steps to install the Gallery widget either manually from UI or automatically via WorkFlow tool

Manual Install Via UI

  1. Enable module "DesignsSquare.com Gallery Widget" that will also enable "DesignsSquare.com: Gallery : Structure and Configurations" & "DesignsSquare.com: Gallery : Gallery Items" module
  2. Enable module "DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Sample Data - Kickstart" for Sample Products(recommended) to import block configurations, galleries, taxonomies, views among other things all related to sample data
  3. Revert Features - "DesignsSquare.com: Gallery : Structure and Configurations","DesignsSquare.com: gallery: Sample Data - Kickstart" and Clear All Cache

Automatic Install via WorkFlow Tool

  1. Deploy the Asset [CODE DEPLOYMENT]
    drush da @ALIAS --package=path/to/package.tar.gz --env=test

  2. Install & Configure [CODE & STRUCTURE DEPLOYMENT]
    drush ca @ALIAS --package=path/to/package --tag=setup,video
  3. Install & Configure & Import Sample Data [CODE,STRUCTURE & SAMPLE DATA DEPLOYMENT]
    drush ca @ALIAS --package=path/to/package --tag=gallery,video,kickstart

    -- OR --

Deploy & Configure with one command [CODE,STRUCTURE & SAMPLE DATA DEPLOYMENT]:
drush pa dependent-install @ALIAS --package=path/to/package --tag=kickstart,video --env=test

Blocks

The gallery widget comes with the following blocks all managed via Block UI or Context UI

  • DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: All - this is a view that is assigned to Gallery Index that way specifying what include in particular Gallery Index
  • DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Block - displays multiple galleries used to assign regions in sidebar, footer and header. It comes with at least two different layouts one of them is in from of slider. See Admin UI for more info
  • DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Teaser - displays teaser of multiple galleries typically to be assigned to content region of home page. By default, the teaser is using slider layout

Important to note that in the Context UI, the blocks are categories under Views section

Contexts

The galley widget comes with the following contexts:

  • Gallery Index - this context is triggered for content types opf "Gallery Index"
  • Gallery Single - this context is triggered for content types of "Gallery"

Fields

Gallery Display Fields

Here are recommended fields for gallery display to have complete functionality

Field NameMachine NameTypePurpose
Introfield_ds_gallery_page_introLong Textimage used int the gallery teaser
Featured Photofield_ds_gallery_featured_imgImageimage used int the gallery teaser
Summaryfield_ds_gallery_summaryLong textshort intro about the gallery displayed in the gallery teaser
BodybodyLong textcontent for the gallery
Itemsfield_ds_gallery_itemGallery Itemall gallery items such as images, video, youtube and vimeo
Tagsfield_ds_gallery_tagsTerm Referencethis references Taxonomy - "Gallery Tags" to provide tags functionality to the gallery
Categoriesfield_ds_gallery_categoriesTerm Referencethis references Taxonomy - "Gallery Categories" to provide tags functionality to the gallery
Index Referencefield_ds_index_referenceEntity Referencethis references to view with all Gallery Indexes, so the application knows how to update breadcrumbs for Gallery

Gallery Index Fields

Here are fields of the Gallery index

Field NameMachine NameTypePurpose
Introfield_ds_gallery_page_introLong textmany themes has sub title of the title and this field is for that purpose
Breadcrumb Categoryfield_breadcrumb_categorytextthe name of how the index should be referenced in the breadcrumbs

Content Types

The Gallery widget comes with two new Content Types:
  • DS Gallery: The layout for gallery Space that displays teaser of the each gallery
  • DS Gallery Index: The layout for displaying galleries

Please, see the Gallery Admin UI for switching layouts for each content type

Layouts

From the Gallery Admin UI, it is possible to change different layouts. Here is summary of available layouts:

ComponentLayoutsComments
IndexK2, EverestK2 comes with filtering per category and pop out effect for all galleries
BlockMcKinley, EverestMcKinley slides each gallery, Everest lists them in columns
TeaserEverestslider of galleries
NodeK2This is only layout for node or gallery space. It adds filters per item tags and pop over effect for all items

Image Styles

In the following are custom styles from Gallery widget:

  • DS Gallery Index Thumb(ds_gallery_index_thumb): to scale featured(promo) image of gallery in index page
  • DS Gallery Node Thumb (ds_gallery_node_thumb): to scale thumbs(promo) of items in gallery in node page
  • DS Gallery Block Thumb(ds_gallery_block_thumb): to scale featured(promo) thumb of gallery in block
  • DS Gallery Teaser Thumb(ds_gallery_teaser_thumb): to scale featured(promo) thumb of gallery in teaser

Go to admin/config/media/image-styles to configure the styles per your needs

See also gallery Admin UI for other configurations at admin/designs-square/ds-widget-gallery

Views

In the following is overview of all views provided by the gallery widget:

ViewSpecificsPurpose
DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Index
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS gallery'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_gallery_index'
contains galleries to display in the gallery index
DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Teaser
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS gallery'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_gallery_teaser'
contains galleries to display in the gallery teaser
DesignsSquare.com: Gallery: Block
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS gallery'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_gallery_block'
contains galleries to display in the block

How To

Scale Thumbnails

By default, the thumbnails in block, index, teaser or node are scaled by the design styles with additional JavaScript functionality to set the heights equal to the longest height. However, you may like to have complete control the size of Thumbnails, then

  1. Enable Thumbnail scaling at Gallery Settings(admin/designs-square/ds-widget-gallery) under Scope(i.e. block, index, node or teaser)/"Thumbnails" of your interest
  2. Once enabled, scale Thumbnails per your needs via Drupal Media Styles functionality(admin/config/media/image-styles). There should be a style for each scope("DS Gallery Block Thumbnails","DS Gallery Index Thumbnails","DS Gallery Node Thumbnails", "DS Gallery Teaser Thumbnails")

Uninstall gallery

The Gallery has a custom field installed as a separate module. This creates a lock prohibiting to uninstall gallery regular way. Instead, follow the following steps to remove the lock, so you can uninstall the Gallery widget:

  • Install DesignsSquare.com: Widget: gallery: Remove Lock module
  • Uninstall DesignsSquare.com: Widget: gallery: Remove Lock module (Make sure click on the 'uninstall' tab to complete uninstall).
  • refresh the cache and run cron job. This should remove lock
  • Now, you should be able to uninstall DesignsSquare.com: Widget: Gallery Item and, afterwards, rest of the gallery modules

Template API

There is common representation - the Template API(TAPI), so the layouts(template files) can be swapped out, customized and added new ones
Content TypeTAPIMethods Implementing APIScope
Gallery Teaser Entry $gallery_tapi['url']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['title']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['intro']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['summary']::[STRING]
$gallery_tapi['tags']::[ARRAY](tags from taxonomy field_ds_gallery_tags)
$gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']::[ARRRAY](array of tag items) $gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']['safe_nameXX]::ARRAY(tag collection index is 'safe_name' of tag) $gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']['safe_nameXX][url]::[STRING] $gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']['safe_nameXX][name]::[STRING] $gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']['safe_nameXX]['name_safe']::[STRING](lower case tag name with '_' in place of space) $gallery_tapi['tags']['collection']['safe_nameXX]['is_last']::[BOOLEAN] $gallery_tapi['tags']['flattened_names']::[STRING](concatenated tag safe name with space between) $gallery_tapi['tags']['all_names']::[ARRAY](array of all tag safe names) $gallery_tapi['categories']::[ARRAY]
$gallery_tapi['categories']::[ARRAY](categories from taxonomy field_ds_gallery_categories)
$gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']::[ARRRAY](array of category items) $gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']['safe_nameXX]::ARRAY(category collection index is 'safe_name' of category) $gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']['safe_nameXX][url]::[STRING] $gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']['safe_nameXX][name]::[STRING] $gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']['safe_nameXX]['name_safe']::[STRING](lower case tag name with '_' in place of space) $gallery_tapi['categories']['collection']['safe_nameXX]['is_last']::[BOOLEAN] $gallery_tapi['categories']['flattened_names']::[STRING](concatenated category safe name with space between) $gallery_tapi['categories']['all_names']::[ARRAY](array of all categories safe names) $gallery_tapi['ds_contextual_links']::[RENDERABLE_ARRAY]
] $gallery_tapi['styles']::[ARRAY](all from _gallery_styles_tapi()>
_gallery_teaser_tapi($node) ds-gallery-index.tpl.php, ds-gallery-block.tpl.php,ds-gallery-teaser.tpl.php
Gallery Entry ...everything from "Gallery Teaser Entry"(_gallery_teaser_tapi()) $gallery_tapi['content']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['index']::[ARRAY];
$gallery_tapi['index']['next']::[ARRAY];
$gallery_tapi['index']['next']['url']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['index']['next']['text']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['index']['previous']::[ARRAY];
$gallery_tapi['index']['previous']['text']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['index']['previous']['url']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['styles']::[ARRAY](all from _gallery_styles_tapi())
_gallery_tapi($node) ds-gallery-index-single.tpl.php, ds-gallery-block-single.tpl.php,ds-gallery-teaser-single.tpl.php
Gallery Node TAPI ...everything from "Gallery TAPI"(_gallery_tapi())
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']::[ARRAY](all gallery items)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['title']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['has_picture']::[BOOLEAN];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['picture']::[ARRAY];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['picture']['url']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['picture_dummy_url']::[STRING](default image placeholder url)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']::[ARRAY];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']['content']::[RENDERABLE_ARRAY](contnet of video)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']['has_video']::[BOOLEAN];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']['is_frame']::[BOOLEAN];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']['is_ajax']::[BOOLEAN];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['video']['url']::[STRING];
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['tags']::[ARRAY](tags for the item)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['tags']['name']::[STRING](combined names of tags with ', ' between)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['tags']['raw']::[ARRAY](array of tag names)
$gallery_tapi['items_tapi']['N']['tags']['flatten_names']::[STRING](combined tags with space between)
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']::[ARRAY](all item tags)
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']['collection']::[ARRAY]
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']['collection']['nameXX']::[ARRAY](array of each tag as index the name iteslf)
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']['collection']['nameXX']['name']::[String]
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']['collection']['nameXX']['safe_name']::[String]
$gallery_tapi['items_tags']['flatten_safe_names']::[SRTRING](all tags combined into string with space between)
_gallery_node_tapi($node)(combined of _gallery_item_tapi, _gallery_tapi,_ds_gallery_retrieve_items_tags) ds-gallery-index-single.tpl.php, ds-gallery-block-single.tpl.php,ds-gallery-teaser-single.tpl.php
Gallery Style TAPI $gallery_tapi['styles']::[ARRAY](all gallery thumbs styles)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['block_thumb']::[ARRAY];(thumb styles in the block scope)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['block_thumb']['height']::[STRING];(i.e. 300px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['block_thumb']['width']::[STRING];(i.e. 400px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['block_thumb']['style']::[STRING];(i.e. "style='width:300px;height:200px')
$gallery_tapi['styles']['index_thumb']::[ARRAY];(thumb styles in the index scope)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['index_thumb']['height']::[STRING];(i.e. 300px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['index_thumb']['width']::[STRING];(i.e. 400px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['index_thumb']['style']::[STRING];(i.e. "style='width:300px;height:200px')
$gallery_tapi['styles']['teaser_thumb']::[ARRAY];(thumb styles in the teaser scope)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['teaser_thumb']['height']::[STRING];(i.e. 300px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['teaser_thumb']['width']::[STRING];(i.e. 400px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['teaser_thumb']['style']::[STRING];(i.e. "style='width:300px;height:200px')
$gallery_tapi['styles']['node_thumb']::[ARRAY];(thumb styles in the node scope)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['node_thumb']['height']::[STRING];(i.e. 300px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['node_thumb']['width']::[STRING];(i.e. 400px)
$gallery_tapi['styles']['node_thumb']['style']::[STRING];(i.e. "style='width:300px;height:200px')
_gallery_style_tapi() none

Artifacts

Here are summary of all artifacts part of the Gallery widget:

ItemContent TypeContextTemplatesViewsComments
Gallery IndexDS Gallery Indexgallery_indexds-gallery-index.tpl.phpnonethis is the layout of the gallery space. The view assigned to the content in the context - 'gallery_index', contains the galleries to display
Gallery DisplayDS Gallerygallery_singleds-gallery-node.tpl.phpn/aIt displays the single gallery
Gallery Teasern/aanyds-gallery-teaser.tpl.phpDesignsSquare.com: Gallery: TeaserThe tag - designssquare_gallery_teaser of the view kicks in the mechanism for teaser and applies the appropriate template. This is good for featuring galleries in home / landing page but can be assigned to any region
Gallery Blockn/aanyds-gallery-block.tpl.phpDesignsSquare.com: Gallery: BlockThe tag - designssquare_gallery_block of the view kicks in the mechanism for appropriate templates of the block. This is good for assigning to regions such as sidebar, footer, etc

Configurations

Configurations are updated via the Gallery Admin UI at admin/designs-square/ds-widget-gallery. Please, see details at Admin space

The Gallery settings are categorized into 5 categories. Besides the general category, all other settings are organized into appropriate scope(element of the widget) of the widget - index, teaser, block and node. Futhermore, under each scope, there is setting for choosing layout, number of columns and settings for scaling thumbnails

Drupal Module Dependencies

In the following are direct dependencies for the gallery widget:
  • field_remove_item adding remove button
  • eva for reference index form project
  • entityreference for reference index form project
  • context
  • views_ui for Editing Views From UI
  • videojs

Please, see the widgets .info file for complete list of Drupal dependencies

Troubleshooting

0. Unable to generate the derived image located at public://... or ... Warning: filesize(): stat failed for

This happens when importing products on Drupal instance running on server without library - libjpeg installed/configured. Solution compile the PHP with libjpeg library or just copy artifacts manually

1. Displays Without Styles Applied or Messed up

This may happen after updating Gallery Admin settings and without refreshing cache. The solution is to refresh cache

2. Local Video not playing or isn't aligned

Make sure the video(videojs,etc) is intalled and configured. Run the following
drush ca @ALIAS --tag=video

Release History

0.1
  • initial release
0.4
  • added admin support
  • added initial Mckinley and Everest
  • Add Category and Tags for Galleries
  • Added Breadcrumbs suppor for Indexes
0.5
  • added video(youtube,vimeo,local videos) support
  • K1 layouts for node added
  • Added pop out support in node
  • Added Gallery Item Tags
  • Rewrite Gallery photos into Gallery items by adding new module Gallery Items
  • Update documentation
  • redone both sample and structure export
0.6
  • generalize item tags
  • refactor items API into shared lib
0.6.1
[CODE deployment]
  • syntax fixes for PHP Ver 5.4 and below
  • added extra check to variables for foreach loops to avoid syntax error
0.6.2
[CODE deployment]
  • array index error fixed for tags
  • array index error fixed in function _default_val_content() for image FID
  • Make Gallery Item tags case sensitive
0.6.3
[CODE, STRUCTURE deployment]
  • fix error "Can only flip STRING and INTEGER values! in DrupalDefaultEntityController->load()"
  • fix error "Undefined offset: 0 in designssquare_com_widget_gallery_item_submit() (line 572"
  • implement automatic cache refresh/cron run after every update of Gallery settings
  • added four Media Styles to give control of scaling thumbnails for Gallery Items in block, teaser, node and index
  • fix bug in Gallery Settings for saving default Gallery Index name

Things For Future Release

Here is list of features and enhancements that will be included in future releases:

  • perhaps, add block for single gallery with one of the layers to have scroller
  • It takes times to load teaser, so lets add progress bar or something to demonstrate loading process
